name: AJUI - Advanced Java User Interface
short_description: AJUI is a java widget toolkit for creating user interfaces in java.  AJUI uses a XUL like xml format for laying out widgets, uses a non tradition event handling system, follows an MVC design pattern, and uses an SPI model enabling AJUI to look native.
